rasa aahara beda hadagena bhaªkthi windima, thagi bhoga gen geta huwamaru wima, awurudda labimata pera ge dora aluth wima, mapiya dudaru senehasa shakthimath wima, mitha්rathwaya thahawuru wima, siyalla thula nawum bawa ha jana jiwithaye ekamuthu kama men ma manawa suwanda pathira yama, anyonya sahayogithwaya mangin ga්ramiya men ma nagarika jana jiwithaya da shakthimath wima aadi samaja watina kam rasak thahawuru wima warthamana kalabalakari kuriru lokaya ma kuda ratak wu shi්ra lankawa keren aadarshayata gatha haki manawa agayan wanne ya.aluth awurudu samaya thula siduwana wadagath charitha්ra waritha්ra athara pa්ramukhathwaya ganna karunu wanne ge dora aluth wadiya karaganima, nawa aswanuwalin labaganna sinhala halen deshiya rasa kawili sada ganima, eewa gengeta marukara ganima, bahara sitina du daruwan thagi bhoga gena mapiyan daknata paminima, niyamitha awurudu nakatha anuwa aluthen lip banda ahara pisima yanadiya yi.meya athishaya wadagath karunak wanne mulu ratapura eka ma welawaka lipagini molawa ahara pisa eka ma welawaka gruhayanhi siyalla ek wa pi්rathiyen ahara ganime samuhika wu da mapiya dudaru senehasa shakthimath wanna wu da unusum pi්rathiya pa්rakata karena durlabha awasthawa ya.pisina lada aluth awurudu kiribath piya wisin pa්rathamayen mawatath, anathuru wa daruwantath siyathin kawanu labima pa්ramukha charitha්rayak weyi.
